TopicTitle: Can't warp any faster in tracking station than the slowest ship in orbit

Articles.Content:
System Info:
Windows 11 Build 22H2 
Intel Core i9-12900   2.40 GHz
32GB RAM
RTX 3080

KSP2 Build 0.1.0.0.20892

Repro steps:  Launch a ship to orbit around Kerbin with apoapsis ~75KM and periapsis around ~71KM.  Go to tracking station and try to warp to correct phase angle for transfer to another body.

Expected behavior:  You can warp as fast as needed because you're in the tracking station.

Actual behavior:  You can't warp any faster than 100x.
